title: Parse Query Parameters
description: Simulate parsing query parameters from a URL string. Extract key-value pairs from the query string portion.
instructions: Write a function parseQuery(url: String) that extracts query parameters into a Map<String, String>. Parse '/api/users?name=Alice&age=25' and print each parameter.

hints.text: Split the URL on '?' to get the query string
Split the query string on '&' to get individual params
Split each param on '=' to get key and value

commonMistakes.mistake: Not handling URLs without query params

commonMistakes.correction: Use substringAfter('?') to get only the query string
